This technique allows the user to manipulate their tendrils and then sends them underground. They then appear underneath their target piercing them multiple times.

== Trivia ==
* Like the rest of Kakuzu's techniques, the name of this techniques comes from the mecha anime {{translation|"''[[wikipedia:Mobile Suit Gundam|Mobile Suit Gundam]]"''|機動戦士ガンダム|Kidō Senshi Gandamu}}. The name Biguro was taken from the [http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/MA-05_Bigro Mobile Suit MA-05] {{translation|"Bigro"|ビグロ|Biguro}}. The name was altered slightly and given kanji to create the name of this technique.

[[es:Biguro]]
